name: Skin That Smoke Wagon!
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Plays similar to regular ol' blackjack. Goal is to reach 21 without busting past it

Hitting is getting another card, stayin is, well, stayin. Shootin...well, hope you loaded that 6-shooter

Cards 2-10 = their face value

Jack, Queen & King = 10

Ace can be a 1 or 11, dependent if your card values are above 11

You got that rusty smoke wagon on your hip if you need it, beware, you might not get your intended results!

If you lose the hand, you lose a heart!

First yellabelly that loses all hearts or gets lead in their gut, loses!
